solution_line_template: Larry jogs for a total of {days_week_1} + {days_week_2} = <<{days_week_1}+{days_week_2}={total_days_jogged}>>{total_days_jogged} days.
Thus, he jogs a total of {total_days_jogged} x {minutes_per_day} = <<{total_days_jogged}*{minutes_per_day}={total_minutes_jogged}>>{total_minutes_jogged} minutes.
